about_the_game:
Hitler is My Crush: Love and Fascism is a crazy love story that defies logic, common sense and everything you knew about the world. You play as a girl madly in love with... Hitler. And like a true lover, you are ready to rush into the thick of things to save him, because he has been kidnapped. But here's the catch: he was kidnapped not by ordinary villains, but by the most absurd enemies you can imagine.

You will find traps, surprises and moments that will leave you perplexed. Every step on the way to freeing your beloved is full of surprises - be prepared to fight various enemies holding Hitler captive. There are robots with quirks, and strange cults, and situations that will make you wonder: "What is going on?"

So, are you ready to go this way for love? Bullets will fly, absurd situations will arise at every step, and you will move forward for the sake of your beloved. Who said that love is easy?

Game Features:

  • Unexpected traps

  • Various enemies holding your beloved Hitler

  • Absurd surprises

  • Giga Boss, dangerous and hot

  • Mini-game with FPV drone

  • An incredible and cute anime girl who destroys everyone for Hitler

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains cartoonish blood and murder, as well as a swastika and revealing clothing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 | Intel i3-10100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6GB +
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
